content.content:

How much time do I have to go to my lunch with Sarah on 2024-05-15. Give me the result in the format 'HH:MM'.

I need to determine how much time Emma has before her lunch with Sarah on 2024-05-15. To do this, I will first find out the current time and then calculate the difference between the current time and the scheduled lunch time.

Let's assume the current time is:

<function-result>{

}</function-result>

Now that I have the current time, I need to calculate the difference between the current time and the scheduled lunch time.

I will assume the lunch with Sarah is at 12:00 (noon) on 2024-05-15. I will now convert both times into a comparable format and compute the difference.
